sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/fruit-details.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import FruitData from '../assets/data/fruits'; import calculateAvgRating from '../untils/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg' const FruitDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); //this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from database const tour = FruitData.find((tour) => tour.id == id); //destructure properties from tour object const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{' '} {calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/Kg {' '} {maxGroupSize}{' '}
Description

{desc}

{/*================== fruit reviews section==========*/}

Reviews({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(reviews=>(
NhatDuat

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString("en-US",options)}

)) }
{/*================== fruit reviews section end==========*/}
); }; export default FruitDetails;
